00055 void run_test(const std::vector<sc_core::sc_module *>& tops) {
00056     uvm_manager *pmanager;
00057     uvm_phase_controller *pcontroller;
00058     //stop_reason_enum stop_reason;
00059     
00060     // TBD - hardcode duration for now (may pass in as parameter to run_test in the future)
00061     const sc_core::sc_time &duration = sc_time(~sc_dt::UINT64_ZERO, false) - sc_time_stamp();
00062 
00063 
00064     pmanager = get_uvm_manager();
00065     pmanager->set_top(tops);        // Pass the 'vector' of tops to the manager
00066 
00067     pcontroller = get_uvm_phase_controller();
00068     pcontroller->set_duration(duration);
00069     pcontroller->start();
00070 
00071     // TODO - report stop reason returned from start()?
00072     //stop_reason = pcontroller->start();
00073 }

00109 std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> uvm_get_children (sc_core::sc_module * pmod) {
00110   std::vector<sc_object*> child_obj_vec;
00111   std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> child_mod_vec;
00112   sc_core::sc_module *pchild;
00113 
00114   child_obj_vec = pmod->get_child_objects();
00115 
00116   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_obj_vec.size(); i++)
00117   {
00118     pchild = DCAST<sc_core::sc_module*>(child_obj_vec[i]);
00119     if (pchild != NULL) {
00120       uvm_component * child_component = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pchild);
00121       if ((child_component == NULL) || (child_component->is_traversable() == true))
00122           child_mod_vec.push_back(pchild);
00123     }
00124   }
00125   return child_mod_vec;
00126 
00127 }

00152 bool uvm_add_schedule(puvm_schedule pschedule)
00153 {
00154     puvm_phase_controller pcontroller = get_uvm_phase_controller();
00155 
00156     if(pcontroller == NULL)
00157         return false;
00158 
00159     return pcontroller->add_schedule(pschedule);
00160 }

00166 
00169 puvm_phase_callback_agent uvm_get_phase_callback_agent(const std::string schedule, const std::string phase, uvm_phase_state state)
00170 {
00171     puvm_phase_controller     pcontroller = NULL;
00172     puvm_schedule             pschedule   = NULL;
00173     puvm_phase                pphase      = NULL;
00174     puvm_phase_callback_agent pagent      = NULL;
00175 
00176     pcontroller = get_uvm_phase_controller();
00177     if (pcontroller != NULL)
00178     {
00179         pschedule = pcontroller->get_schedule_by_name(schedule);
00180         if(pschedule != NULL)
00181         {   
00182             pphase = pschedule->get_phase(phase);
00183             if(pphase != NULL)
00184             {
00185                 pagent = pphase->get_callback_agent(state);
00186             }
00187         }
00188     }
00189 
00190     if(pagent == NULL)
00191         SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_PHASE_CALLBACK_INVALID,"");
00192 
00193     return pagent;
00194 }

00201 
00206 std::string uvm_glob_to_regex(const std::string &glob)
00207 {
00208     uvmsc_boost::regex re("(\\*)|(\\?)|([[:blank:]])|(\\.|\\/)|(\\+|\\^|\\$|\\[|\\]|\\(|\\)|\\{|\\}|\\\\)");
00209     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\\w+)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00210     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\.*)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00211     const char*        format = "(?1\\.*)(?2\\[\\.\\/\\])(?3\\\\s*)(?4[./])(?5\\\\$&)";
00212     //const char*        format = "(?1\\\\.*)(?2\\.)(?3\\\\s*)(?4\\\\$&)";
00213     std::stringstream  final;
00214     int                length;
00215 
00216     length = glob.length();
00217     if (length == 0)
00218     {
00219         final << "/0";
00220     }
00221     // already a regular expression
00222     else if ((glob.substr(0, 1).compare(uvm_regex_encap) == 0) && 
00223              (glob.substr(length - 1, 1).compare(uvm_regex_encap) == 0))
00224     {
00225         final << glob;
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         //final << uvm_regex_encap;
00230         std::ostream_iterator<char, char> oi(final);
00231         uvmsc_boost::regex_replace(oi, glob.begin(), glob.end(), re, format, uvmsc_boost::match_default | uvmsc_boost::format_all);
00232         //final << uvm_regex_encap;
00233     }
00234 
00235     return final.str();
00236 }
00237 
00238 bool uvm_regex_match(const char * re_input, const string & arg)
00239 {
00240     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00241     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(re_input);
00242     
00243     return uvmsc_boost::regex_match(arg, what, re);
00244 }

00266 
00267 void uvm_register_config_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00268 {
00269     if (uvm_config_callback_vec == NULL)
00270         uvm_config_callback_vec = new std::vector<uvm::uvm_component *>;
00271 
00272     uvm_config_callback_vec->push_back(comp);
00273 }
00274 
00275 void uvm_unregister_config_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00276 {
00277     if (uvm_config_callback_vec == NULL)
00278         return;     // nothing to do... vector is empty
00279 
00280     uvm_config_callback_vec->erase( std::remove( uvm_config_callback_vec->begin(), uvm_config_callback_vec->end(), comp ), uvm_config_callback_vec->end() ); 
00281 
00282     if (uvm_config_callback_vec->size() == 0)
00283         delete uvm_config_callback_vec;
00284 
00285 }
00286 
00287 void uvm_config_callback(std::string cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00288 {
00289 
00290     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < uvm_config_callback_vec->size(); i++)
00291     {
00292         (*uvm_config_callback_vec)[i]->config_callback(cntxt, inst_name, field_name, rsrc);
00293     }
00294 }
00295 
00296 void uvm_register_rsrc_callback(uvm_component *comp)
00297 {
00298     uvm_rsrc_callback_vec.push_back(comp);
00299 }
00300 
00301 void uvm_rsrc_callback(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string scope, std::string name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc)
00302 {
00303     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < uvm_rsrc_callback_vec.size(); i++)
00304     {
00305         uvm_rsrc_callback_vec[i]->rsrc_callback(action, scope, name, rsrc);
00306     }
00307 }
